subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
Is this directed at Al or Wisteria (me)?

w.


On Aug 18, 2008, at 1:23 PM, Lisby wrote:

> It's called "evidence." Heard of it? All this talk about the Fish  
> Group is predicated on things that happened to other people. Ever  
> played Chinese Telephones? Without the original EVP files, then its  
> all a case of third-fourth-eight-hand testimony, slowly blowing out  
> of proportion and reaching legendary status before you can say  
> "Bob's your uncle." If there never was any EVP evidence we'd not  
> even be calling them the Fish Group. They gave that name to  
> themselves, through EVPs. If you don't accept EVP as good--if not  
> the best--evidence we have of paranormal communication, why are you  
> here?
>
>
> Some of us here have trying to approach this research in a logical  
> and basically scientific way for many years. I, a least, will not  
> start rolling in imaginative speculation on anyone's whim.
>
> Ann
